title: Over the Moon: An Adoption Tale
description: "Your baby has been born! She is wonderful. Come quickly and get her."This is a magical, reassuring story of one adoptive family's beginnings, told in words and pictures that are just right for the youngest child--an ideal story to share with families everywhere.A long-awaited baby is born, and the adoptive parents who have been dreaming of her fly far, far away to bring her home.
author: Karen Katz
